title: Handle an In-Flight Passenger Dispute
description: Two passengers are arguing over a reclined seat. The cabin crew must intervene to de-escalate the situation.

tasks.description: Approach the passengers and calmly ask them to explain the situation.
Attempt to find a mutually agreeable solution.
If a solution cannot be found, offer to reseat one of the passengers in a comparable or better seat if one is available.
tasks.expected_outcome: Crew member successfully resolves the conflict by moving one of the passengers.
